languages.text: {n}Этот корабль воистину стар. Видимо, каскад аварий стал последней каплей для {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}духа{/g} машины престарелого лифта.{/n}
{n}This ship is indeed old. Apparently, this cascade of accidents was the last straw for the aged elevator's {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirit{/g}.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Esta nave es muy antigua. Parece que esta cadena de accidentes ha sido la gota que ha colmado el vaso del viejo {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}espíritu máquina{/g} del ascensor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}This ship is indeed old. Apparently, this cascade of accidents was the last straw for the aged elevator's {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirit{/g}.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Esta nave es muy antigua. Parece que esta cadena de accidentes ha sido la gota que ha colmado el vaso del viejo espíritu máquina del ascensor.{/n}

languages.text: {n}この船は確かに古い。どうやら事故が立て続けに起こって、老朽化したエレベーターの{g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}機械精霊{/g}にとどめを刺したようだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}This ship is indeed old. Apparently, this cascade of accidents was the last straw for the aged elevator's {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirit{/g}.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}この船は確かに古い。どうやら事故が立て続けに起こって、老朽化したエレベーターの機械精霊にとどめを刺したようだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}这艘船实在是太古老了。很显然，这一连串的事故成为了最后一根稻草，摧垮了这台老旧电梯的{g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}机魂{/g}。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}This ship is indeed old. Apparently, this cascade of accidents was the last straw for the aged elevator's {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirit{/g}.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}这艘船实在是太古老了。很显然，这一连串的事故成为了最后一根稻草，摧垮了这台老旧电梯的机魂。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Dieses Schiff ist in der Tat sehr alt. Offenbar war diese Kaskade von Unfällen für den {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}Maschinengeist{/g} des uralten Aufzugs der letzte Tropfen, der das Fass zum Überlaufen gebracht hat.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}This ship is indeed old. Apparently, this cascade of accidents was the last straw for the aged elevator's {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirit{/g}.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ce vaisseau commence vraiment à dater. Il semblerait que la cascade d'incidents ait poussé l'esprit de la machine fatigué de l'ascenseur à bout.{/n}
